oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church homecoming service, 2000 June 18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service in which Billy Summerford handles a cobra and visitors from Morristown, Tennessee and Middlesboro, Kentucky congregations are present. James Barnes handles fire and children sing during the service.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Homecoming; Imposition of hands; Lay preaching; Prayer; Singing -- Religious aspects; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region, Southern; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Barnes, Jason; Coots, Jamie, (Gregory James), 1971-2014; Dukes, Glenn; Dunn, Rayford; McCormick, Junior; Pelfrey, Bill; Sherbert, Gene; Smith, Parker; Wade, James
Rock House Holiness Church (Sand Mountain, Ala.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Rock House Holiness Church field recordings, 1996-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson Holiness Churches of Appalachia recordings and interviews
